title: Two Doors Down: Secret Admirer
description: Rick and Kate are neighbors and good friends, though they love to tease and compete with one another. They console each other after bad dates and jog together in the park. Their friendship is one to envy. But what happens when they start to feel more than friendship for each other? Will they reveal their feelings or will it take something more extreme, to bring them together?Discover this beautiful, inspiring and entertaining Friends to lovers Romance story that is guaranteed to warm your heart. PLUS BONUS stories inside!Two Doors Secret Admirer is Book 1 in this New Adult romance series. The next Blurred Lines is available now.
author: Lauren B.
